com.acs.bluetooth

Class BluetoothReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Acr1255uj1Reader, Acr3901us1Reader

    public abstract class BluetoothReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The BluetoothReader class represents ACS Bluetooth readers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnAtrAvailableListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the ATR string is available.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnAuthenticationCompleteListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the authentication is completed.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnCardPowerOffCompleteListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the reader powers off the card.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnCardStatusAvailableListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the card status is available.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnCardStatusChangeListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the card status is changed.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnDeviceInfoAvailableListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the device information is available.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnEnableNotificationCompleteListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the reader get the result of enable notification.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnEscapeResponseAvailableListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the escape response is available.
      static interface  BluetoothReader.OnResponseApduAvailableListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the response APDU is available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluetoothReader

        public BluetoothReader()
        Creates an instance of BluetoothReader.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public abstract boolean authenticate(byte[] masterKey)
        Authenticates the reader. If you want to receive the authentication result, you need to register a callback using setOnAuthenticationCompleteListener() method.
        Parameters:
        masterKey - the master key. The length must be 16 bytes.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of masterKey is not equal to 16 bytes long.

      • enableNotification

        public abstract boolean enableNotification(boolean enabled)
        Enables the reader's battery status or level, card status and response notifications. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnEnableNotificationCompleteListener() method. If you want to receive these status change notifications, you need to register callback.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if start to listen reader's status change, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        true if this operation was initiated successfully, otherwise false.

      • getCardStatus

        public abstract boolean getCardStatus()
        Gets the card status. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnCardStatusResponseAvailableListener() method.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • getDeviceInfo

        public abstract boolean getDeviceInfo(int infoId)
        Gets the device information. If you want to receive the result, you need to register the callback by calling setOnDeviceInfoAvailableListener() method.
        Parameters:
        infoId - the identity of the information to be read.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • powerOffCard

        public abstract boolean powerOffCard()
        Powers off the card. If you want to receive the result of power off card, you need to register a callback using setOnCardPowerOffCompleteListener() method.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • powerOnCard

        public abstract boolean powerOnCard()
        Powers on the card. If you want to receive the result of power on card, you need to register a callback using setOnAtrAvailableListener() method.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • setOnAtrAvailableListener

        public void setOnAtrAvailableListener(BluetoothReader.OnAtrAvailableListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the card is powered on and the ATR string is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnAuthenticationCompleteListener

        public void setOnAuthenticationCompleteListener(BluetoothReader.OnAuthenticationCompleteListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the authentication result is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnCardPowerOffCompleteListener

        public void setOnCardPowerOffCompleteListener(BluetoothReader.OnCardPowerOffCompleteListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the card power off result is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnCardStatusAvailableListener

        public void setOnCardStatusAvailableListener(BluetoothReader.OnCardStatusAvailableListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the card status is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnCardStatusChangeListener

        public void setOnCardStatusChangeListener(BluetoothReader.OnCardStatusChangeListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the card status change notification is received.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnDeviceInfoAvailableListener

        public void setOnDeviceInfoAvailableListener(BluetoothReader.OnDeviceInfoAvailableListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the device information response is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnEnableNotificationCompleteListener

        public void setOnEnableNotificationCompleteListener(BluetoothReader.OnEnableNotificationCompleteListener listener)

      • setOnEscapeResponseAvailableListener

        public void setOnEscapeResponseAvailableListener(BluetoothReader.OnEscapeResponseAvailableListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the escape command response is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • setOnResponseApduAvailableListener

        public void setOnResponseApduAvailableListener(BluetoothReader.OnResponseApduAvailableListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the response APDU is available.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.

      • transmitApdu

        public abstract boolean transmitApdu(byte[] apdu)
        Transmits the APDU. If you want to receive the response APDU, you need to register a callback using setOnResponseApduAvailableListener() method.
        Parameters:
        apdu - the APDU to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.

      • transmitEscapeCommand

        public abstract boolean transmitEscapeCommand(byte[] escapeCommand)
        Transmits the escape command. If you want to receive the result of transmit escape command, you need to register a callback using setOnEscapeResponseAvailableListener() method.
        Parameters:
        escapeCommand - the escape command to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is connected, otherwise false.
